note.p: Daughter of Thomas Phinn, surgeon, and his wife, Jane. Married Waite Hockin Stirling in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire, in 1852. Died in Argentina.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1728/45/40)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1938 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 3 September 2019)
Somerset, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1914 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 3 September 2019)
